dict.string:
# write DELIMITER plus ;; as suggestion selected as snippet echo "DELIMITER \${0:;;}"
# `cat` reads the STDIN which contains the selected # text from the Query Editor and write it as selected # snippet plus the mirrowed suggested delimiter echo "\${1:`cat`}\${1:\$0}"
# write DELIMITER plus ; echo "DELIMITER ;"

Wrap the current query or the selection in DELIMITER inserted as snippet to allow to modify the default delimiter ;;
Version 1.0
Wrap the current query or selection in DELIMITER ;;
